definitions.body: with [[בְּ]]

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: divine choice, of Abraham Ne 9:7; Israel De 7:7 Is 44:1, Ez Eze 20:5; to become his people De 7:6, De 14:2; Jeshurun Is 44:2; the seed of the patriarchs De 4:37, De 10:15; Levites De 18:5, De 21:5, 1Ch 15:2, 2Ch 29:11; Aaron Ps 105:26; Judah 1Ch 28:4 not Ephraim Ps 78:67; Levi and Judah Je 33:24; the king De 17:15, especially David 1Sa 10:24, 1Sa 16:8, 1Sa 16:9, 1Sa 16:10, 2Sa 6:21, 1Ki 8:16 (= 2Ch 6:6) 1Ch 28:4, 1Ch 28:5, 1Ch 29:1, 2Ch 6:5, Ps 78:70; others Nu 16:5, Nu 17:5 (P) Hag 2:23; place of sacrifice De 12:18, De 14:25, De 16:7, De 16:15, De 17:8, 2Ch 7:12; the city 1Ki 8:16, 1Ki 8:44 (= 2Ch 6:5, 2Ch 6:34) 1Ki 11:32; Jerusalem 2Ch 6:6, Is 14:1, Zec 1:17, Zec 2:16, Zec 3:2; Zion Ps 132:13; delusions Is 66:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: man's choice, of ways Pr 3:31, Is 66:3; good things Is 7:15, Is 7:16; life De 30:19; gods Ju Jdg 10:14 Is 41:24; God's pleasure Is 56:4, Is 65:12, Is 66:4.
with [[אֲשֶׁר]] (alone, for ´[[אשׁר בחר ב]]):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: divine choice, Israel Is 41:8 [[יַעֲקׂב אֲשֶׁר בְּחַרְתִּיךָ]], Is 43:10; the people 1Ki 3:8, Ps 33:12; men Nu 16:7 (P) Ps 65:5; king 2Sa 16:18, 1Ki 11:34; place of sacrifice De 12:14, De 12:26, De 15:20, De 17:10, De 31:11 (D) Jos 9:27 (P), especially [[לָשׂוּם שְׁמוֹ שָׁם]] De 12:5, De 12:21, De 14:24, [[לְשַׁכֵּן שְׁמוֹ שָׁם]] De 12:11, De 14:23, De 16:2, De 16:6, De 16:11, Ne 1:9; the city 1Ki 8:48 (= 2Ch 6:38), [[לשׂום שׁמי שׁם]] 1Ki 11:36, 1Ki 14:21 (= 2Ch 12:13); Jerusalem 1Ki 11:13, 2Ki 21:7 (= 2Ch 33:7) 2Ki 23:27; fast Is 58:5, Is 58:6; way Ps 25:12.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: man's choice, place to dwell in De 23:7; gardens Is 1:29; king 1Sa 12:13; wives Ge 6:2 (J); what to do 2Sa 15:15.
with acc. & [[לְ]], choose some one or something for:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: divine choice, of Levi 1Sa 2:28; Jacob Ps 135:4, Ps 135:5; inheritance Ps 47:5.
with acc. and [[מִן]], choose, select from 2Sa 10:9 (= 1Ch 19:10).
acc.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: divine choice, temple 2Ch 7:16; Judah Ps 78:68; servant Is 41:9, Is 49:7.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: man's choice, persons Ex 18:28 (E) Ju Jdg 5:8, Jos 8:3 (J) 2Sa 17:1; things Job 7:15, Job 9:14, Job 15:5, Job 29:25, Job 34:33, Job 119:30, Job 119:173, Pr 1:29, Is 40:20.
with [[עַל]], [[כי על זה בחרת מעני]] for this thou hast chosen rather than affliction Job 36:21; with acc. and [[על]] pregn. [[כל אשׁר תבחר עלי]] all that thou choosest (to lay) upon me 2Sa 19:39.

with [[לְ]] of acc. 1Sa 20:30 (many MSS. have [[בְּ]]; but LXX We Dr read [[חָבֵר]] companion). The ptcp. [[בָּחוּר]] chosen, of a ruler Ps 89:20, warrior Je 49:19 (= Je 50:44); as cedars Ct So 5:15; coll. [[רכב בחור]] chosen chariots Ex 14:7 (E); [[אישׁ בחור]] chosen men, warriors Ju Jdg 20:15, Jdg 20:16, Jdg 20:34, 1Sa 24:3, 2Ch 13:3, 2Ch 13:17, for wh. [[בָּחוּר]] alone 1Ki 12:21 = 2Ch 11:1, 2Ch 25:5; [[בחורי ישׂראל]] 1Sa 26:2, Ps 78:31, 2Sa 10:9 [[בחורי בישׂראל]] (‖ 1Ch 19:10 [[בחור בישׂראל]], doubtless the true reading, as 2Sa 6:1).

test, try (Aram. = [[בחן]]) [[בְּחַרְתִּיךָ בְּכוּר עָׂנִי]] Is 48:10 I have tested thee in the furnace of affliction SyrVer Targum Ges Hi Ew De Che Dr, but chosen Vulgate Rab Calv AV. Niph. [[נִבְחַר]] Je 8:3; Pt. [[נִבְחָר]] Pr 8:10 + 5 t.;—to be chosen.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: abs. chosen, choice Pr 8:10, Pr 8:19, Pr 10:20.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: cstr. [[מִן]], [[וְנִבְחַר]] [[מות מחיים]] death will be chosen rather than life Je 8:3; choicer than Pr 16:16, Pr 22:1; [[נבחר ליהוה מזבח]] choicer (more acceptable) to Yahweh than peace-offering Pr 21:3.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: [[יְבֻחַר]] chosen, selected Ec 9:4 ([[יְחֻבַּר]] Qr).
